overview:
Started Dr Adept in 1998 to get away from the real work and being told what to do by idiots.

Problem Solving was my main activity, fixing computers and installing network systems was great but could be very frustrating at times, started web design which took off and so stopped I.T. support work and went completely web design and development as well as creating logo and signature fonts.

Developed in-house content manager which has been adapted over the years to work with all clients and make life easier for updates, meaning we do not charge for updates now as they are so easy to carry out.

Implemented full e-commerce system and love learning new technologies such as jQuery.
